title: A Pneumonia Case Associated with Type 2 Polio Vaccine Strains
body:
This work was supported by grants from the Beijing Municipal Science and Technology Commission (No. Z151100003915140), the Capital Medical Development and Scientific Research Fund (No. 2016-2-3011), and the National Major Science and Technology Project for Control and Prevention of Major Infectious Diseases of China (No. 2016ZX10004206).

There are no conflicts of interest.
